subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Question on how fast the bands should sweep
author: Marlboro63@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1207863436
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hi Kay,
 
You really wanted to make sure that wire was clipped when you did  it to both 
ends.  Just make sure you listen between the radio stations to  the static 
and white noise.
 
Jeff
 
 
In a message dated 4/10/2008 3:57:35 P.M. Central Daylight Time,  
psfponies@... writes:

 
 
 
Thanks Jeff 

Just to make sure I clipped both ends of the mute wire!  The FM band 
sweeps fine. I still havent gotten any response from using  that one 
yet or maybe I just am not hearing it. I really need to get setup  to 
record my session so I can go back over them. 

Kay

I  figured The FM band sweeps fine I has just a --- In EVP-
_ITC@..._ (mailto:ITC@yahoogroups.com) ,  Marlboro63@.,  Mar
>
> Hi Kay,
> 
> That's all  you needed to do was clip the mute wire and put it 
back together. 
>  The am does exactly as you say but still works fine. I get 
better 
>  communication on the fm band no matter what unit I use. Good 
luck and let  us know 
> your results.
> 
> Jeff
> 
> 
>  In a message dated 4/10/2008 3:16:05 P.M. Central Daylight Time, 
>  psfponies@..  psfp
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Jeff  
> 
> Did you hack your 12-820 radio? I just did a test on it and  I am 
not 
> totally sure I did the hack right I couldnt find any  instructions 
so 
> I just clipped the mute wire. eeeek!!! I still  think the AM band 
is 
> sweeping slower than it should it seems to  stay one a station 
longer 
> than it should. I am going to open it  back up when I get home and 
> take a second look. 
> 
>  Kay
> 
> --- In _EVP-ITC@yahoogroup --- In _EVP-ITC@ya
_ITC@..._ (mailto:ITC@yahoogroups.com) ) , 
>  Marlboro63@, Mar
> >
> > Kay,
> > 
> > The  am will sweep a little slower which is normal. But isn't it 
> nice  
> > without all the clicking? And the fm sweep is great on that  
> unit. I have had 
> > awesome results with mine and wish you  lots of luck with yours.
> > 
> > Jeff
> > 
>  > 
> > In a message dated 4/10/2008 11:22:34 A.M. Central Daylight  
Time, 
> > psfponies@ psfponies@
> > 
> >  
> > 
> > 
> > I went ahead and opened up my 12-820  RS radio and clipped the 
mute 
> > wire it is set up simular to  the old 12-470 with wires instead 
of 
> > pins. It sweeps both  bands fine. Is there any certain rate the 
> band 
> > should  be sweeping. I noticed that the FM band sweeps faster 
then 
> the  
> > AM band.
> > 
> > Kay
